text: Gerd Heidemann (4 December 1931 â€“ 9 December 2024) was a German journalist. He was best known for his role in the publication of Hitler Diaries that were later proved to be fake. Heidemann died in Hamburg, Germany on 9 December 2024, at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2024 deaths Category:German journalists Category:Writers from Hamburg
title: Gerd Heidemann
